metadata.Title: CVE-2020-29363 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in p11-kit 0.23.6 through 0.23.21. A heap-basedbuffer overflow has been discovered in the RPC protocol used by p11-kitserver/remote commands and the client library. When the remote entitysupplies a serialized byte array in a CK_ATTRIBUTE, the receiving entitymay not allocate sufficient length for the buffer to store the deserializedvalue.

criterions.comment: p11-kit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
